pageContext.claim: “Never in the history of our Country has the “press” been more dishonest than it is today. Stories that should be good, are bad. Stories that should be bad, are horrible. Many stories, like with the REAL story on Russia, Clinton & the DNC, seldom get reported. Too bad!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is insinuating the press aren't reporting on a story about Clinton and Russia, but no links have emerged between the Clinton campaign and the Kremlin. 36 people — several of whom were connected to the Trump campaign — pleaded guilty in the special counsel's ongoing investigation.
